articles.author: Marshall Cohen, CNN
articles.title: WSJ: FBI took 11 sets of classified docs from Mar-a-Lago, including some at highest classification level
articles.description: The FBI recovered 11 sets of classified documents from its search of Mar-a-Lago earlier this week, including some materials marked as "top secret/SCI," The Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.

articles.title: Opinion: Why Trump thinks the FBI search could be a winner for him
articles.description: Attacking the legitimacy of our institutions was a central pillar to Donald Trump's rhetoric both as candidate and president, writes Julian Zelizer. Now under multiple investigations, Trump seems to be finding his rhythm once again.

articles.author: Analysis by Brian Stelter, CNN Business
articles.title: Attacks on the FBI come before America has the facts
articles.description: Three days after the unprecedented FBI search of Mar-a-Lago, Attorney General Merrick Garland defended the employees of the DOJ and FBI on Thursday, stating, "I will not stand by silently when their integrity is unfairly attacked."

articles.title: Live updates: Trump documents from FBI's Mar-a-Lago search
